mapper.select: SELECT A.ROUT_GRP ,A.OPER_SN ,A.NODE_ID ,A.NODE_SN ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.COR_ID ,A.NODE_TYPE , IFNULL(B.ARRV_TM, A.ARRV_TM) AS ARRV_TM , IFNULL(B.DPRT_TM, A.DPRT_TM) AS DPRT_TM ,C.ROUT_GRP_NM ,C.WAY_ASC_NM ,C.WAY_DESC_NM ,D.ROUT_ID ,D.NODE_NM ,D.ACCRU_LEN ,E.ARRV_TM AS CHG_ARRV_TM ,E.DPRT_TM AS CHG_DPRT_TM ,DATE_FORMAT(E.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT FROM BMS_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_DAY_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO B ON B.OPER_DT = DATE_FORMAT(#{OPER_DT}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.ROUT_GRP = B.ROUT_GRP AND A.DAY_DIV = B.DAY_DIV AND A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.OPER_SN = B.OPER_SN AND A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = B.NODE_SN LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_GRP_MST C ON A.ROUT_GRP = C.ROUT_GRP LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN_VW D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID AND A.NODE_ID = D.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = D.NODE_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_CUR_CHG_OPER_DTL_INFO_HIS E ON E.OPER_DT = #{OPER_DT} AND E.ALLOC_NO = #{ALLOC_NO} AND A.ROUT_GRP = E.ROUT_GRP AND A.ROUT_ID = E.ROUT_ID AND A.OPER_SN = E.OPER_SN AND A.NODE_ID = E.NODE_ID AND A.NODE_SN = E.NODE_SN WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} ORDER BY OPER_SN, E.OCR_DTM, NODE_SN

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BMS_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002') AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV}
GROUP BY OPER_SN
